p: Further, the cytotoxic property of chia seed oil was assessed in LNcap and HepG 2 cells. Our data indicated the IC 25 values (IC 25 value is the concentration of the sample required to inhibit 25% of cell growth) of CSO were up to 580 and 889.68 Î¼g/mL in LNcap and HepG 2 cell lines for 48 h, separately, which means cell toxic effects can be excluded by this extract method on this cell line ( Table 4).
